publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4761.1 Sandra White: A Charter for Change—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4761) in the name of Elaine Smith, leave out from "urges" to end and insert ", and believes that this change can only be brought about through the establishment of a fully independent Scotland."
S3M-4761.1 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Dave Thompson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Michael Matheson*, Angela Constance*

S3M-4761.1 Sandra White: A Charter for Change—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4761) in the name of Elaine Smith, leave out from "urges" to end and insert ", and believes that this change can only be brought about through the establishment of a fully independent Scotland." Supported by: Dave Thompson, Anne McLaughlin, Bill Wilson, Joe FitzPatrick, Michael Matheson, Angela Constance
S3M-4761.1 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-4761.1 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Gil Paterson*
